verses.verse: In the hour of trial, Jesus, plead for me, Lest by base denial I depart from Thee; When Thou see'st me waver, with a look recall, Nor, for fear or favor, suffer me to fall.
Should Thy mercy send me sorrow, toil, and woe, Or should pain attend me on my path below, Grant that I may never fail Thy hand to see; Grant that I may ever cast my care on Thee.
